= Introduction =

This page contains instructions on how to build [http://hoxchess.googlecode.com/ hoxchess] the binaries files based on the *latest* version of the source code.
The page's content is solely based on my experience working on the project.


= Requirements =
Starting from version *0.0.2.0*, the project can run under Windows and Linux, thanks to the cross platform portability of [http://www.wxwidgets.org wxWidgets].

=== Under Windows ===
  * Windows XP or Vista.
  * Visual C++ 2005 Express Edition.

=== Under Linux ===
  * [http://www.centos.org/ CentOS] 4.5 using Eclipse CDT 3.3, or
  * [http://www.ubuntu.com/ Ubuntu] 7.10 using [http://www.kdevelop.org KDevelop] 3.5 (as an Automake based project).
